texts.text_1: I'm Kata Deli, a graphic designer. I completed my studies at VISART College, majoring in Visual Communication - Graphic and Digital Design.
texts.text_2: I have been working as a graphic designer for more than 10 years, in various fields. I love my work and through it, I get to know different people, professional areas, and needs, and by assessing and getting to know them, I can create the most suitable visual solution for them.
texts.text_3: I consider it essential to be up to date with new trends and to keep up with the developing technical world, so I am constantly training myself in various courses (web design, UI design, animation, and kinetic typography). I adapt the graphic material to the customer's needs.

home.workflowtitle: You can expect the following steps during the workflow:

workflow.text_4: At the beginning of the design process, I map out the expectations and ideas.
workflow.text_5: In the first round, I create several versions, and then, after consultation, I start on the most suitable path for the customer towards the final version.
workflow.text_6: I will present the finished material and modify it as needed.
workflow.text_7: I hand over the final graphic material to the client.
